sentences.sentence: "Yes, please, sir," said the elder of the two hedgehogs respectfully.
sentences.translation: “是的，先生。”两只刺猬中较年长的一只恭恭敬敬地说。

sentences.sentence: The sight of these greedy young hedgehogs stuffing themselves with fried ham makes me feel positively famished.
sentences.translation: 看到这些贪吃的小刺猬把油炸火腿填得满满一腮帮子，我真是饿坏了。

sentences.sentence: Animals which save energy by hibernation or lethargy (e. g. bats or hedgehogs) live much longer than those which are always active
sentences.translation: 通过冬眠或昏睡来节省能量的动物（例如蝙蝠或刺猬）比那些一直很活跃的动物活得更久。
